t: Is 'made in Turkey' the same as 'made in Europe'?
s: Answer (1 of 3): On the face of it this seems like a very simple question, that can be anwered without citing any sources. No: ‘made in Turkey’ is not the same as ‘made in Europe’. Turkey lies partially in the continent of Europe. So you could argue that products made in Turkey are ...

t: Amazon will soon launch Amazon Turkey
s: October 19, 2018 - Amazon will soon launch Amazon.com.tr, a localized version of its website, dedicated to Turkish consumers. Amazon will not only have its own website in Turkey, but also its own warehouse and office.
